title: Garens Ult Effect
body: When i ult as garen the shockwave effect is not coming, i have all my settings turned to low is that why?

replies.body: I just tested this myself with all my settings turned to the lowest and I could still see the shockwave. Have you tried running a client repair to fix this?
It was the same on my old laptop, i tried client repair but it didnt work
